text:
Create a test plan, add parameters to this test plan, change language, all
parameters are removed...
creator: arnaudbely@free.fr

text:
Need a bit more detail on this.

Which parameters? Does it happen with all test plans?
creator: sebb@apache.org
arnaudbely@free.fr
text:
Sorry, parameters is not the right term.

The problem occur with 'User Defined Variables' in the root TestPlan item. This
list is emptied when modifying the language.

OK, I see what you mean now.

Perhaps the run-time language change option should be removed for the time 
being - it does not work with all test elements anyway.
creator: sebb@apache.org
sebb@apache.org
text: This seems to have been fixed by the changes to the various clear() methods.
